00026 #include <algorithm> // for max
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include "Array3.h"
00029 
00030 Array3::Array3( void ){
00031   data_ = new float();
00032   nx_ = 0;
00033   ny_ = 0;
00034   nz_ = 0;
00035   RealContainer_ = false;
00036 }
00037 
00038 Array3::Array3( float *dataptr, int nx, int ny, int nz ){
00039   data_ = dataptr;
00040   nx_ = nx;
00041   ny_ = ny;
00042   nz_ = nz;
00043   RealContainer_ = true;
00044 }
00045 
00046 Array3::Array3( int nx, int ny, int nz ){
00047   std::cout << " in Array3 constructor..." << std::endl;
00048   nx_ = nx;
00049   ny_ = ny;
00050   nz_ = nz;
00051   data_ = new float[ nx_*ny_*nz_ ];
00052   RealContainer_ = true;
00053   for ( long long i = 0; i < nx_*ny_*nz_; ++i ){
00054     data_[ i ] = 0.0f;
00055   }
00056 }
00057 
00058 Array3::~Array3(){
00059   if ( RealContainer_ ){
00060     delete[] data_;
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 float 
00065 Array3::operator() ( int ix, int iy, int iz ) {
00066   long long i =  ( ix * ny_ + iy ) * nz_ + iz;
00067   return data_[i];
00068 }
00069 
00070 void
00071 Array3::setValue(int ix, int iy, int iz, float val){
00072   long long i =  ( ix * ny_ + iy ) * nz_ + iz;
00073   data_[i] = val;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void
00077 Array3::addValue(int ix, int iy, int iz, float val){
00078   long long i =  ( ix * ny_ + iy ) * nz_ + iz;
00079   data_[i] += val;
00080 } 
00081 
00082 int
00083 Array3::get_size( void ) {
00084   return std::max( std::max( nx_, ny_ ), nz_ );
00085 }
00086 
00087 void 
00088 Array3::recreate( int nx, int ny, int nz ) {
00089   if ( RealContainer_ ){
00090     delete[] data_;
00091   } else {
00092     RealContainer_ = true;
00093     nx_ = nx;
00094     ny_ = ny;
00095     nz_ = nz;
00096     data_ = new float[ nx_ * ny_ * nz_ ];
00097     
00098     for ( long long i = 0; i < nx*ny*nz; ++i ){
00099       data_[ i ] = 0.0f;
00100     }
00101   }
00102 }
